Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui

Class TUIstate

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.tui.TUIstate
Direct Known Subclasses:
InitState, JoinedToGameState, PlayingState
public abstract class TUIstate extends Object
Abstract class that represents the state of the TUI.

  • Field Details

    • stateName

      protected String stateName
      The name of the current concrete TUIState. Used to check the current state of the TUI.

    • commandsMap

      protected Map<String,Runnable> commandsMap
      A map of all user-executable commands for the current concrete TUIState.

      This map contains commands that the user can execute directly. A command may have an implementation in the concrete TUIState and not be executable by the user; such commands are not included in this map and are invoked only by TUI methods or other TUIState commands.

      Key: Command tag as a string. Value: The command implementation as a Runnable.

    • commandsInfo

      protected Map<String,String> commandsInfo
      A map of all user-executable commands tags and their short description for the current concrete TUIState.

      The user can write the command's tag contained in this map to execute the corresponding command

      Key: Command tag as a string. Value: Command short description.

    • tui

      protected TUI tui

    • command_refresh

      protected abstract void command_refresh()
      Sometimes, due to different terminal setup and properties the printed tui could break. This command refresh and prints all the previous printed TUIareas.
      See Also:
      • TUI.forceRefreshTUI(boolean)

    • stateNotify

      protected void stateNotify()
      Every time the TUI.cmdLineReaderTHREAD is about to read the new input it waits this method to be called to procede and read the new characters. This allow the TUIcommands to read their own input without concurrency issues. Generally to let the cmdLineReaderThread procede each command should invoke this method at the end of its implementation, however each time a TUIcommand should block the cmdLineReaderThread and wait for a server response must not call stateNotify() that should be called by its corresponding ShowUpdate method.

      The correspondence between cmdLineReaderThread blocking and the invocation of stateNotify() must be one-to-one; if the cmdLineReaderThread is blocked and stateNotify() is called twice to unblock it, a deadlock will occur

      Short sequence diagram verbose description:

      • A user-executable TUIstateCommands is read by the cmdLineReaderThread and sent to cmdLineProcessThread by the TUI.commandToProcess(TUIstateCommands, boolean) method
      • TUI.cmdLineProcessTHREAD executes the command running the corresponding commandsMap Runnable
      • Somewhere in the code a stateNotify() is called (more info in the next lines); thanks to TUI.stateLockQueueLOCK the method waits the cmdLineReaderThread to be about to read the input.
      • cmdLineReaderThread notifies on stateLockQueue that it's about to take the input and waits on TUI.stateLOCK.
      • after being notified on stateLockQueue stateNotify() notifies the cmdLineReaderThread on stateLock and unblock it

      stateNotify() can be called by:

      • a TUIcommands implementation
      • TUI.commandToProcess(TUIstateCommands, boolean) method with the boolean parameter set to true; Required when the call to stateNotify() is not present in the TUIcommand implementation but is still necessary to unlock the cmdLineReaderThread. commandToProcess(TUIcommands, boolean) is also called by some ShowUpdate methods.
      • a

    • command_invalidCommand

      protected void command_invalidCommand()
      If there is non user-executable corresponding to the typed tag by the user this command is called. It prints a message to the user that the command is invalid.

      It calls stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

    • setUsername

      protected abstract void setUsername()
      Asks the user to type his username and send the corresponding request to the Controller(socket) or RmiServer(rmi).
      See Also:

    • command_showGames

      protected abstract void command_showGames()
      Sends the request to the Controller to show the list of available games.

      Blocks the cmdLineReaderThread until the Controller responds with ShowUpdate.show_listGame(java.util.List)

      See Also:
      • InitState.command_showGames()
      • JoinedToGameState.command_showGames()
      • PlayingState.command_showGames()
      • ClientCommands.getGameList()

    • command_joinGame

      protected abstract void command_joinGame()
      Sends the request to the Controller to join the game with the typed gameID.
      See Also:

    • command_ready

      protected abstract void command_ready()
      Sends the request to the Controller to set the client as ready to play.

      It calls stateNotify() to unblock the cmdLineReaderThread.

      See Also:
      • JoinedToGameState.command_ready()
      • ClientCommands.setReady(boolean)
